content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. Solutions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":62991,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3c232586-1148-4cc9-b1c6-c0900917c99d/logo.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3c232586-1148-4cc9-b1c6-c0900917c99d/logo.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"logo.jpg\",\"name\":\"logo.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3c232586-1148-4cc9-b1c6-c0900917c99d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":280,\"height\":280},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amit Singhal \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VP, Head of European Delivery\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19639,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b313750-b67a-421a-b8de-99474358765a/amit.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b313750-b67a-421a-b8de-99474358765a/amit.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"amit.jpg\",\"name\":\"amit.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9b313750-b67a-421a-b8de-99474358765a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":267,\"height\":267},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amit is Head of European Delivery at EPAM. In his current role, Amit focuses on building an empowered technology and delivery organisation in Europe to conceptualise, design and deliver complex solutions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amit began his career as a Java Programmer in the US and has worked in Singapore, Germany and Belgium, giving him a wealth of international experience. He currently lives in London with his family. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amit is a hands-on delivery practitioner who is passionate about delivering value to EPAM’s customers through strong partnerships. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amit holds an engineering degree and a master's in business administration. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tarek Nseir \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VP, Head of Digital Engagement Practice, Europe\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14770,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/65a2ad8e-ed6b-4054-b60e-e51cd900823b/tarek.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/65a2ad8e-ed6b-4054-b60e-e51cd900823b/tarek.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"tarek.jpg\",\"name\":\"tarek.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"65a2ad8e-ed6b-4054-b60e-e51cd900823b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":269,\"height\":269},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tarek is Head of Digital Engagement Practice (DEP) Europe at EPAM. He was formerly a Founding Partner at TH_NK, a digital agency acquired by EPAM in 2018. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As part of EPAM, DEP is a solution practice that delivers consultancy, design, marketing and digital engineering services.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tarek has partnered with clients through their most ambitious programmes, including helping Atom to design a bank from scratch and working directly with J. K. Rowling to conceive and create Pottermore, a digital legacy for her most loved novels and one of the most exciting and anticipated publishing launches in years. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tarek has spent the past three years as co-president of BIMA, the industry association representing the digital and interactive media industry, evolving it into an entirely future-focused initiative and extending membership to other leaders to fundamentally power Britain’s digital industry and give it a voice.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"He is a regular marketing industry speaker and commentator in the trade and national media.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
